Sequence Information.Source: 1. Capsicum annuum (Hybrid of Ikeda x UENF 1381)

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Characterization of Peptides from Capsicum annuum Hybrid Seeds with Inhibitory Activity Against ?-Amylase, Serine Proteinases and Fungi.
Literature.Author: Vieira Bard GC, Nascimento VV, Ribeiro SF, Rodrigues R, Perales J, Teixeira-Ferreira A, Carvalho AO, Fernandes KV, Gomes VM
